recordables

Interface CommandRecordable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Command
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CopyRecordable, CutRecordable, DelTextRecordable, InsTextRecordable, PasteRecordable, SelectRecordable

    public interface CommandRecordable
extends Command
    CommandRecordable is implemented by the recordable commands. It allows to save and restore their state when asked to.
    See Also:
    Recorder, MementoCommand

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MementoCommand getMemento()
      Get a memento saving the state of the object.
      void restore(MementoCommand memento)
      Restore the state from the given memento.

      • Methods inherited from interface commands.Command

        execute

      • getMemento

        the memento containing the state of this object
        See Also:
        MementoCommand

      • restore

        void restore(MementoCommand memento)
        Restore the state from the given memento.
        Parameters:
        memento - the memento containing the state to restore
